name: 塔防阵线
description:
Tower defense front is the first tower defense game of Yunmeng game studio. In 3076, the world has been occupied and destroyed by robots. The last survivors hide under the ground to seek hope for survival. At the entrance of the underground shelter, you, as a commander, can control the turret based defense system to resist robot attacks. In the two difficulty modes, you will experience different madness of the enemy.
In the tower defense front, you will experience the original science fiction story and take you to feel the doomsday state of human being dominated by robots. Under the gradually increasing difficulty curve, you will gradually grow from a novice commander to a talented general with second to none human military strength, master the matching and reasonable delivery of turrets, and understand the weaknesses of different enemies.
In the battle, you can not only experience the pleasure of beating the enemy, but also deeply explore the strategy of the game, such as using active skills as much as possible; Upgrade as much as possible; When the capital is abundant, the newly unlocked tower is used, although the cost performance is low, but the output is more; If the turret is placed at the corner, it can cause more damage;
In the game, you will continue to be familiar with more similar strategies. Using these strategies and rules to beat the enemy, you can defend the survivors in the underground shelter.
Tower defense front is produced and distributed by Yunmeng game studio.
